imt: not  learned.\textsc{3sg}  \textsc{sbjv} not  cook.\textsc{3sg}    the   John.\textsc{nom}
src: \textbf{Den}   emathe    na   \textbf{min} magirevi    o    Janis
trs: John didn’t learn not to cook (i.e. ‘John still has the habit of cooking’).
